Class PlanetsCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.cards.cards_objects.Card
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.cards.cards_objects.PlanetsCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlanetsCard extends Card
The PlanetsCard class represents a "Planets" card in the game. This card specifies a list of planets with inside cargos that you can take and a number of flight days reduction in case of landing on the planet. It extends the abstract class Card and implements the specific properties of this card type.

      level - the level of the card.
      image - the image of the ship.
      planets - the list of planets that can be discovered.
      flightDaysReduction - the number of flight days to reduce.
